mng: straight, erect, to stick out (a part of the body), to (physically) straighten up, to support, to withstand, outstanding, (coll.) quite, very, classifier for machine guns

exm.mng: to stand erect, to stand upright
to stand firm, to stand one's ground (in the face of adversity or pain)
to endure with all one's will, to hold out, rigid, stiff
(standing) very straight, straight as a ramrod, bolt upright, well-ironed, trim
